channel.title: Battle of The Bands
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Battle of The Bands"

item.title: Re: Battle of The Bands
item.content:encoded: How I won was I used My team Tubby, Flutie, and the twins, I had a 32 level on tai and used wind sycthe justu.

item.title: Re: Battle of The Bands
item.content:encoded: Well, this is my advice as I am quite seasoned at Wastelands…when it comes to certian missions where there is one specific stat that you have to tackle…make a team that maximizes your range/levels/strength in that stat. For example, for the special mission Second Opinion, make a team that will maximize the Nin stat. As for the Battle of The Bands, maximize the appropriate stat by not having any team member that will take away from the levels and/or range. If you are at a mission that reqires a team member that lowers a stat (see the junk missions), then try to cancel out the level loss with another team member. That is all I can tell you really…

item.title: Re: Battle of The Bands
item.content:encoded:
For the last check,which is a Tai 14d 17s,make sure to have the appropriate amount of renge and levels.Then,try using Rock on:Wide load,which is taught by Tubby lv.2

The +5 sucesses should help.If they do not,try a different team setup or getting even more range/levels to help you out.

item.title: Battle of The Bands
item.content:encoded: Whats the best jutsu to use for Battle of the bands? I keep failing, and it gets annoying after a while.
